GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
cifs: Fix memory leak on the deferred close

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 60b6d38add7b9c17d6e5d49ee8e930ea1a5650c5, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 9e992755be8f2d458a0bcbefd19e493483c1dba2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cifs: Fix memory leak on the deferred close
